documents.title: Quickstart - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Welcome to Zencoder! This guide will have you up and running with your AI coding assistant in under 5 minutes. By the end, you'll have Zencoder installed, connected to your project, and ready to help you code faster.
documents.summary: This document provides comprehensive instructions for installing Zencoder across various platforms, setting up custom AI agents and Zen Rules, and navigating model selection and shortcuts.

documents.title: Introduction - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Zencoder is an AI coding agent helpings developers write, analyze, and optimize code in their IDEs
documents.summary: This document introduces Zencoder, an AI-powered coding assistant that integrates with IDEs to automate development tasks using specialized agents and codebase analysis.

documents.title: Subscriptions - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Zencoder offers flexible subscription plans designed to fit a range of development needs, from individuals to teams.
documents.summary: This document outlines Zencoder's subscription plans, feature comparisons, AI model options, and dynamic seat allocation mechanics for users and administrators.

documents.title: Product Updates - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Follow the ongoing evolution of our AI coding assistant
documents.summary: This document provides a chronological record of monthly product updates and feature releases for the Zencoder AI coding companion throughout 2025.

documents.title: Core Concepts - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Learn the key concepts that power Zencoder—from Agents and Repo Grokking to the Model Context Protocol. Understanding these fundamentals will help you work more effectively with AI-assisted coding.
documents.summary: This document provides a comprehensive overview of Zencoder's core technologies, specialized AI agents, and developer-focused features like code generation and testing. It explains the foundational Repo Grokking and Agentic Pipeline technologies alongside various integration options for popular IDEs and third-party tools.

documents.title: Enterprise Best Practices Overview - Zencoder Docs
documents.summary: This overview outlines the core practice areas for high-performing engineering organizations to adopt AI coding, including security, automation, and performance measurement. It serves as a navigational hub for detailed enterprise playbooks designed to maximize the value of Zencoder.

documents.title: Orchestrating Agents in Zenflow - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Coordinate workflows, verification, and parallel execution across Zenflow.
documents.summary: This document explains the Zenflow orchestration architecture, detailing how projects, tasks, and subtasks structure AI agent workflows for reliable software engineering.

documents.title: Universal AI Platform - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Unifying the world's most popular AI coding CLIs with Zencoder directly in your IDE
documents.summary: This document introduces Zencoder, a platform that bridges the gap between AI CLI tools and IDEs, enabling developers to use existing AI subscriptions within a unified enterprise environment.

documents.title: Ask Agent - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: AI Code-aware chat interface for quick questions and simple tasks

documents.title: Integrations and MCP - Zencoder Docs
documents.description: Connect Zencoder with your tools and workflows through multiple integration paths
documents.summary: This document outlines the three primary integration paths for Zencoder, including native integrations, a browser extension, and support for the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to connect with external data sources.

documents.description: Go from idea to verified, production-ready code within minutes.
